channel.title: [TOTAL NOOB] i need to change server IP. im new
channel.description:
ok guys im just starting out on servers and i have a server ready to play about with etc and change, and the tutorials page loaded up, and i have a few clients that would play the server.. only problem is.. idk how to change the ip to mine :( Ive looked in everywhere that i can find and nothing :(
thanks guys excuse my noobyness
if someone could suggest some good clients for 317, 508 and 525s aswell please

there is no client.java there its really annoyin me. only client.class

link to mennas client please? thx

item.source: [TOTAL NOOB] i need to change server IP. im new

item.title: [TOTAL NOOB] i need to change server IP. im new
item.dc:creator: @wonderspring wonderspring
item.description:
@wonderspring wrote:

Lol Its simple Open you client.java from your client - CTRL + F and search for " setserver " there change the ip adress with yours (remember there are allways 2 ip’s in client.java ) Also search for the ip you found in client.java in other files like Gui.java or Server.java :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 15, 2009, 09:27:26 am[/size][hr]And for your Server Source just search the ip you found in your client folder in client.java or Server.java files from your Source Server

Read full topic
